version.description: The release version given as three numbers separated by dots (e.g. 2.0.0)

os.description: The installer version: win32 | win64 | mac, etc.

url.description: The appropriate url for downloading the installer for this particular os

items.description: Simple object for pairing the installer url with an os version

platforms.description: The list of release versions for each platform (win32, win64, macosx32, multiplaform...)

description: Simple object for storing information about the latest release of the ead2 editor available on the repository. This update.json file should be generated automatically on each release and uploaded to SF.net.
